process.title: Understand & Define
process.description: Analyze the problem domain, define success metrics, and gather requirements through stakeholder collaboration and data exploration.

process.title: Research & Experiment
process.description: Explore relevant ML techniques, review state-of-the-art approaches, and run rapid experiments to validate feasibility and approach.

process.title: Develop & Optimize
process.description: Build robust ML pipelines, train and tune models, apply optimization techniques, and ensure production-ready performance and reliability.

process.title: Deploy & Monitor
process.description: Integrate models into production systems, implement monitoring and feedback loops, and continuously improve based on real-world performance data.
